plot total sales by category:
category_sales = df.groupby("Category")["Sales"].sum()
category_sales.plot(kind="bar", title="Total Sales by Category", color="orchid")
plt.xlabel("Category")
plt.ylabel("Sales")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig("../outputs/plot_sales_by_category.png", bbox_inches="tight")
plt.show()
plot sales vs sub-category:
df.groupby("Sub-Category")["Sales"].sum().plot(kind='barh', title='Sales by Sub-Category', color='violet')
plt.xlabel('Sales')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig("../outputs/plot_sales_by_subcategory.png", bbox_inches="tight")
plt.show()
plot monthly sales trend:
df['Order Date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Order Date'])
monthly_sales = df.groupby(df['Order Date'].dt.to_period('M'))['Sales'].sum()
monthly_sales.index = monthly_sales.index.to_timestamp()
monthly_sales.plot(title='Monthly Sales Trend', color='deeppink')
plt.ylabel('Sales')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig("../outputs/plot_monthly_sales_trend.png", bbox_inches="tight")
plt.show()
plot sales distribution by ship mode:
mode_sales = df.groupby('Ship Mode')['Sales'].sum()
mode_sales.plot.pie(autopct='%1.1f%%', startangle=90, title='Sales by Ship Mode')
plt.ylabel('')
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig("../outputs/plot_sales_by_ship_mode.png", bbox_inches="tight")
plt.show()
